reviewText: Good but would have been better with more than 1 example and also more technics on how to create or make hair
Neville Page is a genius in his field.  Delighted to have this informative instructional DVD for reference.  Will be getting more of his DVD's shortly.

Techniques of Neville Page 1: Character Design -- Fantasy Wildebeest The DVD is materfull just like all of the works from this artist! But my review isn't just about this, it is about Amazon.com. I looked everywhere for this DVD and they were all sold out everywhere,I came to Amazon and they got it for me, I don't know how but they followed thru and I was so pleased, I will always check here first because they mean business and satisfing customers they are the BEST! Thank You Amazon! Ron
